languages.text: "Ты была пособницей еретиков, и тебя тронула колдовская скверна. На твоем месте я бы просил о быстрой казни". {n}В словах Соломона нет ненависти — только полная вера в сказанное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Исключено. Ты обвиняешься в пособничестве преступнику и будешь казнена, как и он".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words, only total conviction about their truth.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты была пособницей еретиков, и тебя тронула колдовская скверна. На твоем месте я бы просил о быстрой казни". {n}В словах Соломона нет ненависти — только полная вера в сказанное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words; only a complete conviction behind what he says.{/n}

"And not a sliver of remorse. Just fear for her own skin. Do not be swayed by a criminal's tears. I have seen many of those, and they are worth nothing. Or should I rather say, not worth more than a bullet."

"You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words, only total conviction about their truth.{/n}

"You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words, only total conviction about their truth.{/n}

"And not a sliver of remorse. Just fear for her own skin. Do not be swayed by a criminal's tears. I have seen plenty of those, and they are worth nothing. Or, I should say, not worth more than a bullet."

"And not a sliver of remorse. Just fear for her own skin. Do not be swayed by a criminal's tears. I have seen plenty of those, and they are worth nothing. Or, I should say, not worth more than a bullet."

"You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words; only a complete conviction behind what he says.{/n}

languages.text: “你曾是异端分子的帮凶，你的灵魂已经被邪恶的巫术侵染。如果换做我是你，我会祈求给我个痛快。”{n}索罗蒙的话语中没有任何仇恨的意味，只有坚定不移的信念。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words, only total conviction about their truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你曾是异端分子的帮凶，你的灵魂已经被邪恶的巫术侵染。如果换做我是你，我会祈求给我个痛快。”{n}索罗蒙的话语中没有任何仇恨的意味，只有坚定不移的信念。{/n}

languages.text: 「では、少しの良心の呵責もありません。ただ、彼女の姿のままでいることを恐れているだけです。犯罪者の涙に心を揺さぶられてはいけません。そういう人をたくさん見てきましたが、意味はありません。むしろ、銃弾以上の価値はないと言うべきでしょう」
languages.original_text: "And not a sliver of remorse. Just fear for her own skin. Do not be swayed by a criminal's tears. I have seen plenty of those, and they are worth nothing. Or, I should say, not worth more than a bullet."

traits.locale_text: 「では、少しの良心の呵責もありません。ただ、彼女の姿のままでいることを恐れているだけです。犯罪者の涙に心を揺さぶられてはいけません。そういう人をたくさん見てきましたが、意味はありません。むしろ、銃弾以上の価値はないと言うべきでしょう」

languages.text: «Fue cómplice de herejes y le ha tocado su vil hechicería. En su posición, rogaría una ejecución rápida». {n}No hay odio en las palabras de Solomorne, solo una convicción absoluta de su veracidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words, only total conviction about their truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Fue cómplice de herejes y le ha tocado su vil hechicería. En su posición, rogaría una ejecución rápida». {n}No hay odio en las palabras de Solomorne, solo una convicción absoluta de su veracidad.{/n}

languages.text: "Kâfirlerle iş birliği ettin, sahirliğin etkisi altına girdin. Yerinde olsam hızlı bir infaz için yalvarmaya başlardım." {n}Solomorne'un sözlerinde nefret sezilmiyor, yalnızca söylediklerinin doğruluğuna yürekten inandığı görülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words, only total conviction about their truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlerle iş birliği ettin, sahirliğin etkisi altına girdin. Yerinde olsam hızlı bir infaz için yalvarmaya başlardım." {n}Solomorne'un sözlerinde nefret sezilmiyor, yalnızca söylediklerinin doğruluğuna yürekten inandığı görülüyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous avez été complice des hérétiques et contaminée par le mal impie. À votre place, j'implorerais une exécution rapide. » {n}Il n'y a aucune haine dans les paroles de Solomorne, rien qu'une foi absolue en sa vérité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words, only total conviction about their truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez été complice des hérétiques et contaminée par le mal impie. À votre place, j'implorerais une exécution rapide. » {n}Il n'y a aucune haine dans les paroles de Solomorne, rien qu'une foi absolue en sa vérité.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt die Ketzer unterstützt und wurdet von einer magischen Pest berührt. In Eurer Position würde ich um eine schnelle Exekution flehen." {n}Solomorne Worte sind frei von Hass. Er ist vielmehr fest von ihrem Wahrheitsgehalt überzeugt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You were an accomplice to the heretics, and you have been touched by sorcerous blight. In your position, I would beg for a swift execution." {n}There is no hatred in Solomorne's words, only total conviction about their truth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die Ketzer unterstützt und wurdet von einer magischen Pest berührt. In Eurer Position würde ich um eine schnelle Exekution flehen." {n}Solomorne Worte sind frei von Hass. Er ist vielmehr fest von ihrem Wahrheitsgehalt überzeugt.{/n}
